detail_desc: Fitted jumpsuit in patterned velour with a V-neck front and back and a faux fur-trimmed tail. Unlined.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with faux fur ears on top.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with shoulder pads and a zip down the front.
Fancy dress costume in glossy, patterned velour with long sleeves, long legs and a deep neckline at the back.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Fancy dress costume in velour with a zip down the front, a hood with appliqués, a faux fur mane and tail and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave with a high waist, small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.

Playsuit in a crinkled chiffon weave containing glittery threads. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Detachable, twisted tie belt with tassels. Lined.
Metal tiara with sparkly glass and plastic stones.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with open sections and a stand-up collar with press-studs at the top. Sleeveless on one side and one long sleeve that extends over the hand with a thumbhole. Unlined.

Short fancy dress costume in lace with a V-neck, lined cups with a silicone trim at the top and bodice with support panels and a zip at the back. Lined skirt and underskirt in a double layer of tulle.
Fancy dress costume in printed jersey with long sleeves, long legs and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
Fancy dress costume in glossy, patterned velour with long sleeves, long legs and a deep neckline at the back.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with a felted hat on top.

Short clown dress in patterned velour with a deep neckline, pompoms at the front and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and a collar that is attached at the back of the neck, made of a double layer of wide flounces in an airy weave with a contrasting colour trim. Seam at the waist with an elastic waistband in a contrasting colour and a jersey-lined balloon skirt.
Short shorts in a crêpe weave with a high waist, small frill trim at the top and side pockets.

Pirate dress in stretch velour with a glittery motif on the front, a deep neckline and short, elasticated puff sleeves with a frill trim. Detachable elastic belt with a plastic buckle at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric skirt in satin and tulle. Unlined.
Fancy dress costume in printed velour with appliqués. Lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, front pockets, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Satin-covered Alice band with a pointed, felted clown hat that has a faux fur pompom on top.
Short fancy dress top in jersey with shell-shaped, padded cups with a silicone trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Fancy dress costume with a lace body and a sewn-in flared skirt in tulle. Body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups, a zip at the back and support panels at the front, back and sides. Lower section in glossy jersey and a skirt that ties with satin ribbons at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motifs front and back.

Long-sleeved circus costume in soft velour with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and fringed epaulettes. Glittery elastication at the cuffs, decorative buttons at the front and a peplum that divides at the back.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and print motifs front and back.
Short T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and tie detail at the hem.

Oversized, calf-length dungaree dress in cotton twill. Relaxed, straight style with straps that fasten at the front with a button, an open chest pocket, large patch front pockets, a back pocket and a loop at one side. Unlined.
Short T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and tie detail at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length fancy dress skirt in jersey with a high, elasticated waist and chiffon flounces at the top. Seam above the hem with several layers of mesh and chiffon. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Fitted, round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and a round, rib-trimmed neckline.

Short cold-shoulder top in airy, patterned, crinkled chiffon with a concealed zip at the back. V-neck with flounces that cross at the front and continue at the back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, and long sleeves with a double flounce at the top and narrow, buttoned cuffs with a frill trim. Slightly shorter at the front.

Short V-neck dress in woven fabric with a shimmering metallic finish. Concealed zip at the back, long, wide sleeves with ribbing and a zip at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and shaping seams front and back. Unlined.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. T-shirt dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, a round, ribbed neckline and dropped shoulders.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cropped shirt in a shimmering metallic weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Scarf in woven fabric.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining. Width of brim 6 cm.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Boxy-style shirt in airy organza with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Short sleeves, two open chest pockets, and slits in the sides.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Bucket hat in woven fabric with eyelets at the sides and a cotton lining. Width of brim 6 cm.
Short, flared, off-the-shoulder dress in lace with elastication around the top and short, wide raglan sleeves. Raw, scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem. Satin lining with a scalloped edge.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cycling shorts in stretch jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and contrasting colour flatlock seams.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Cropped top in stretch jersey with contrasting colour flatlock seams.
Short T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck and tie detail at the hem.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Shorts in airy organza with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist, side pockets, open back pockets and slits in the sides.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, kangaroo pocket and long, raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Contrasting colour drawstring at the collar and cuffs.
JUSTINE SKYE x H&M. Short skirt in a rustle weave with wide, covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Lined.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.
Ankle-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with long sleeves and covered buttons at the back. V-neck satin underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, text print on the front and dropped shoulders.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.
Fancy dress costume in glossy jersey with a V-neck, zip at the back and button at the back of the neck. Large shoulder pads, elastication at the waist and short legs.

Ankle-length sports trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Wide legs with sewn-in creases down the front and stripes down the sides in a contrasting colour.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.

Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, shoulder pads and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Lined.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with short sleeves. Smocking and a frill trim at the top and around the sleeves, a drawstring down the front and covered elastication at the hem.

Cropped blouse in airy organic cotton poplin. Sweetheart neckline with a small lace trim and a vertical drawstring down the front with ties. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim. Covered elastication at the hem.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with lace trims, a deep, square neckline and decorative lacing at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a pocket in one side. Apron with long ties and decorative lace trims above the hem. Lined at the top.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with lace trims, a deep, square neckline and decorative lacing at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a pocket in one side. Apron with long ties and decorative lace trims above the hem. Lined at the top.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with darts and a concealed zip at the top and a deep neckline with a small frill trim in a contrasting colour. Seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Seersucker apron with wide ties and decorative satin ribbon trims at the hem. Lining in a recycled polyester and cotton blend.

Kangol x H&M. Short, fitted dress in jersey made from a cotton blend. Narrow cut at the top with double-layered shoulder straps and a cut-out section at the front. Contrasting colour panels with a drawstring down the sides that ends at the hem.
Kangol x H&M. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and recycled polyester blend. High, elasticated waist, a print motif on the front, side pockets, and elastication at the hems.
